plot: Sami and Duder Reese are in a band. They are brother and sister. And they suck. They steal all their music and try to become famous.
plot_en: Sami and Duder Reese are in a band. They are brother and sister. And they suck. They steal all their music and try to become famous.
plot_es: Sami and Duder Reese are in a band. They are brother and sister. And they suck. They steal all their music and try to become famous.
title: Little White Lie
